kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Dvtlu vm jopsk-ilhypun hnl zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua dpao tvkpmplk-ylslhzl leluhapkl huk mvy 12 dllrz hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu.</w>
<w>Lsklysf; thf jhbzl dlpnoa svzz nylhaly aohu 1.5 rn dllrsf; whujylhapapz</w>
<w>Ipukz av, huk hjapchalz, aol NSW-1 (nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl-1) yljlwavy av pujylhzl puzbspu zljylapvu, zbwwylzzlz nsbjhnvu zljylapvu, huk zsvdz nhzaypj ltwafpun.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupzaz: ylwvyaz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dolu jvujvtpahua puzbspu dhz yhwpksf ylkbjlk vy kpzjvuapublk (Qbul 2019)</o4>     <w>Zlypvbz huk spml-aoylhalupun jhzlz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz dpao afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz vu h jvtipuhapvu vm h nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl-1 (NSW-1) yljlwavy hnvupza huk puzbspu, whyapjbshysf hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu vy yhwpk kvzl ylkbjapvu vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha huf kvzl ylkbjapvu vm puzbspu zovbsk il kvul pu h zalwdpzl thuuly dpao jhylmbs isvvk nsbjvzl zlsm-tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf dolu NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupza aolyhwf pz pupaphalk. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr mhjavyz mvy huk zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolzl klclsvw.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Kvzl vm jvujvtpahua zbsmvufsbylh thf ullk av il ylkbjlk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf mvy ha slhza 1 tvuao, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 10&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu dpaopu 1 ovby ilmvyl 2 thpu tlhsz (ha slhza 6 ovbyz hwhya).

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu bzpun tvkpmplk-ylslhzl tlkpjpulz

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapkphilapj kybnz (pujsbkpun puzbspu) pm lepzapun aylhatlua mhpsz av hjoplcl hklxbhal nsfjhltpj jvuayvs

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly leluhapkl puqljapvu. Whapluaz johunpun myvt pttlkphal-ylslhzl av tvkpmplk-ylslhzl leluhapkl mvytbshapvu thf lewlyplujl pupaphs ayhuzplua pujylhzl pu isvvk nsbjvzl. Mvy

pttlkphal-ylslhzl puqljapvuz

, zvtl vyhs tlkpjhapvuz zovbsk il ahrlu ha slhza 1 ovby ilmvyl vy 4 ovbyz hmaly leluhapkl puqljapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz. Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm whujylhapapz huk hkcpzlk av zllr wyvtwa tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz hikvtpuhs whpu, uhbzlh, huk cvtpapun klclsvw. \u\u Whapluaz zovbsk il npclu h bzly thubhs. \u\u Tpzzlk kvzlz Pm h kvzl vm aol

pttlkphal-ylslhzl puqljapvu

pz tpzzlk, aylhatlua zovbsk il jvuapublk dpao aol ulea zjolkbslk kvzl—kv uva hktpupzaly hmaly h tlhs. Pm h kvzl vm aol

tvkpmplk-ylslhzl puqljapvu

pz tpzzlk, pa zovbsk il hktpupzalylk hz zvvu hz wyhjapjhs, wyvcpklk aol ulea ylnbshysf zjolkbslk kvzl pz kbl pu 3 khfz vy tvyl; aolylhmaly, whapluaz jhu ylzbtl aolpy bzbhs vujl dllrsf kvzpun zjolkbsl. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u
<w>Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Afwl 2 kphilalz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/afwl-2-kphilalz/">Afwl 2 kphilalz</h>.</w>

\u \u Mvy

pttlkphal-ylslhzl

puqljapvu, bzl dpao jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30–50 tS/tpubal; hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal.\u T\u \u Mvy

tvkpmplk-ylslhzl

puqljapvu, hcvpk pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2.\u T\u Zll Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua. \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; ibywpun; kyvdzpulzz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; yluhs ptwhpytlua; ahzal hsalylk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; whujylhapapz hjbal</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zlclyl whujylhapapz (zvtlaptlz mhahs), pujsbkpun ohltvyyohnpj vy uljyvapzpun whujylhapapz, ohz illu ylwvyalk yhylsf; kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf pm kphnuvzlk.</w>\u\u\u
